title: BSc (Hons) Creative Computing
description: Blend computing and creative practice to build apps, craft digital experiences and explore machine intelligence.

title: BSc (Hons) Creative Robotics
description: Learn to design, build and program robots while investigating their role and creative potential in society.

title: BSc (Hons) Computer Science
description: Gain a solid foundation in programming, algorithms, computer graphics and AI, applied in creative contexts.

title: BSc (Hons) Data Science and AI
description: Develop practical skills in data analysis, machine learning and AI to shape data-driven creative solutions.

title: MSc Creative Computing
description: Advance your skills in creative coding, machine learning and interactive systems for the digital creative industries.
entryRequirements: Undergraduate degree in computing or related discipline

title: MSc Creative Robotics
description: Explore advanced robotics design and creative applications, combining mechanical, software and interactive systems.
entryRequirements: Undergraduate degree in computing, engineering or related discipline

title: MSc Computer Science
description: Deepen your computing knowledge—covering algorithms, systems, graphics and AI—with optional creative project pathways.
entryRequirements: Undergraduate degree in computer science or related discipline

title: MSc Data Science and AI
description: Master data science methods and AI techniques for large-scale analysis and creative applications.
entryRequirements: Undergraduate degree with strong quantitative content

title: MSc Applied Machine Learning for Creatives
description: Apply cutting-edge machine learning to creative workflows, from generative art to interactive installations.
entryRequirements: Undergraduate degree in computing, design or related discipline

title: MAMSc Computing in the Creative Industries (Modular)
description: Build a bespoke PG programme across modules in creative computing, tailored to your interests and schedule.

title: MA Internet E-qualities
description: Critically examine digital inclusion, equity and social impact of online technologies.
entryRequirements: Undergraduate degree in humanities, creative or tech discipline

title: MRes Creative Computing
description: Conduct research-led creative computing projects with mentorship from the CCI research community.
